mapper.sql: ID, AC_ID, CG_ID, TITLE, SUMMARY, ISTOP, Like_COUNT, ACCESS_COUNT, COMMENT_COUNT, EDITOR, TAG, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, STATUS, DEF1, DEF2, DEF3
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from bg_article_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into bg_article_info (AC_ID, CG_ID, TITLE, SUMMARY, ISTOP, Like_COUNT, ACCESS_COUNT, COMMENT_COUNT, EDITOR, TAG, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, STATUS, DEF1, DEF2, DEF3) values (#{acId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{istop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accessCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{def1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{def2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{def3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%m-%d') AS name, count(DISTINCT(t1.ID)) AS value FROM bg_article_info t1 WHERE ( t1.CREATE_TIME >= #{beginTime} AND t1.CREATE_TIME <= #{endTime} ) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
select count(*) from bg_article_info where CG_ID LIKE #{Param1}
